generated_description: cube optics, based in mainz, rhineland-palatinate, is a company specializing in the development and manufacture of high-quality, active and passive optical transport solutions and miniaturized optical components. the company's product range includes dwdm, cwdm, 100g, and 40g multiplexers, attenuators, plc splitters, and various optical components for metro and long-haul transport, as well as 5g and 4g applications. cube optics serves the telecommunications industry with its advanced optical transport and component solutions.
